ValidationRule.description: This rule prevents the change of status from Spotted to any other status except Cancelled without an Assigned Resource
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISBLANK(Service_Resource__c) && (ISPICKVAL(Status, "Dispatched") || ISPICKVAL(Status, "En Route") || ISPICKVAL(Status, "On Location") || ISPICKVAL(Status, "In Tow") || ISPICKVAL(Status, "Tow Complete")) && NOT(isBlank(EntitlementId))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The selected status requires the child service appointments to be assigned to a resource.
